definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: This section surveys the different support options.
sentences.chinese: 此部分通盘考虑了各种支持选项。

sentences.english: If rappels are necessary, check every knot and anchor point thoroughly for its security.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要绳降，通盘检查每一个绳结和锚点的安全性。

sentences.english: The matter invites our consideration of every possible angle.
sentences.chinese: 这件事需要我们通盘考虑。

sentences.english: If you take everything into consideration, you will see that mine is the only choice.
sentences.chinese: 如果你通盘考虑，就知道我的对策是唯一的选择。

sentences.english: The matter invites our consideration of every possible angle .
sentences.chinese: 这件事需要我们通盘考虑。

sentences.english: The distribution of wages is a matter of overall importance. The government takes it into all-round consideration.
sentences.chinese: 工资问题事关全局，由国家通盘考虑，统一部署。

definition: lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
to stand tall and see far (idiom); taking the long and broad view/acute foresight
an overall plan taking into account all factors
to consider/to give serious consideration to sth/consideration
to judge the hour and size up the situation/to take stock
(idiom) take care of everything; handle everything
